author: Derek Osborn
releaseNotes: v7.00.1 - Speed Improvements. Improve 3 Day Forecast Tile and removed FeelsLike value since it didn't seem to be correct. - Improve Coding Logic. Added ICAO Airport Code for Forecasts. - Display an @ sign in forcast day if a WU warning exist for the day.  Since WU doesn't provide illuminance, stop using solar radiation as it's value
